org.orgName: Provisional Congress of the Confederate States of America

body.p: Unicameral provisional legislative body of the Confederate States of America. Convened in Montgomery, Alabama and in Richmond, Virginia, after July 20, 1861. Kentucky delegates included: Henry Cornelius Burnett, Theodore Legrand Burnett, John Milton Elliott, George Washington Ewing, Samuel Howard Ford, George Baird Hodge, Thomas Johnson, Thomas Bell Monroe, John J. Thomas, and Daniel Price White.

bibl.p: Ezra J. Warner, Biographical Register of the Confederate Congress (Baton Rouge: Louisiana State University Press, 1975).
